capstone.gui

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.gui.Note

  • public class Note
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a note in music.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Note(int track, int beat)
      Create a new, default note at the specified track and beat.
      Note(int track, int beat, int pitch, int volume, int duration, int instrument)
      Creates a new note with the specified MIDI information, track, and beat.

            int beat,
            int pitch,
            int volume,
            int duration,
            int instrument)
        Creates a new note with the specified MIDI information, track, and beat.
        Parameters:
        track - the track the note is on
        beat - the beat the note is on
        pitch - the note's pitch value
        volume - the volume of the note
        duration - the duration of the note
        instrument - the MIDI instrument the note uses
